executiveSummary: Elise and Sam pitched their company Rocco on Shark Tank, seeking $600,000 for 3% equity to fund their designer beverage fridge. After several Sharks declined due to valuation concerns, Kevin O’Leary ('Mr. Wonderful') initially offered $600,000 for 10%, later negotiating to a $600,000 deal with a 4% royalty until repayment plus an additional $300,000. The deal was ultimately accepted.
keyDecisions: Kevin O’Leary invested $600,000 in Rocco with a 4% royalty until repayment plus an additional $300,000.

actionItems.task: Finalize investment agreement details and implement royalty terms with Kevin O’Leary.
Prepare for increased production and marketing following the Shark Tank deal.

nextSteps: Elise and Sam will formalize their agreement with Kevin O’Leary and begin scaling operations to meet projected demand and fulfill future sales growth.
